scripts.buildmac-x64: npm run buildui && npm run buildapi -- --runtime osx-x64 && npm run buildelectron -- -c builder-config.json -c.mac.identity=null
scripts.buildmac-arm64: npm run buildui && npm run buildapi -- --runtime osx-arm64 && npm run buildelectron -- -c builder-config-arm64.json -c.mac.identity=null
scripts.buildwin: npm run buildui && npm run buildapi -- --runtime win-x64 && npm run buildelectron -- -c builder-config.json
scripts.buildlinux-x64: npm run buildui && npm run buildapi -- --runtime linux-x64 && npm run buildelectron -- -c builder-config.json
scripts.buildlinux-arm64: npm run buildui && npm run buildapi -- --runtime linux-arm64 && npm run buildelectron -- -c builder-config-arm64.json
